medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain awoke the patient from sleep at 3am and has been persistent in the right lower quadrant (RLQ) without migrating. The patient has experienced nausea throughout the day but denies emesis or diarrhea. There has been anorexia since the morning.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Familial hyperlipidemia; Past surgical history: none.
